overview.base: You can hear all moving creatures within 30 feet. If the creature is breathing, you can hear it even if it is not moving. You can not detect silent creatures in this way.

You can passively smell the types of all living creatures within 30 feet. You can detect dead and undead creatures as well, but you cannot distinguish within or between them. They all smell like death. You also gain Scent Seeing. You can not detect odorless creatures in this way.

You know the exact location of all target creatures. You continue to know the location of all targets within 10 feet, whether they are or you are moving or not, so long as they are still within 10 feet of you.

system.requirements: You are not anosmatic and the target is not odorless.

overview.base: You gain Battle Cry Aura and Battle Cry Resistance.
This ability cannot affect deaf creatures.

results.fail: Targets become frightened.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the targets' turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: You resist being frightened.

system.endCondition: You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.base: Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
As you attack, choose either arm or leg. The damage gets dealt accordingly.

results.hit: The target takes 1 hack damage on either an arm or leg, depending on what you chose.
results.critHit: The target takes 2 hack damage on either arms or legs, depending on what you chose.

overview.base: Pick 1 species you're familiar with. Your allies have Gifted Snare against creatures of that species. You also have Limited Flanking against creatures of that species.
overview.proficient: You may instead pick up to P species you're familiar with.
overview.fluent: You may instead pick up to F species you're familiar with.

system.requirements: You are not sustaining Hunting Party.

overview.base: You have advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are within 5 feet of an ally of yours that isn't incapacitated and that you can see.

system.limitation: You only get the benefits of Flanking against creatures of the species you chose.

results.hit: Target takes a body hack.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes standard damage as well.

overview.base: You always have at least 1 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.
You cannot use items in your hands.

Target takes an additional [[/roll 5[lethal]]] damage. This also has all damage types of the triggering attack. If the triggering attack was a critical hit, this deals [[/roll 10[lethal]]] damage instead.

system.trigger: You have just hit a creature with an attack that dealt them damage from it.

overview.base: You are an expert tracker. In addition, you gain Agile outside towns and other urban areas.
You walk through difficult terrain at normal speed.

results.hit: Target takes a vitals hack of your choice.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes standard damage as well.
